description:
Gérez votre argent à tout moment avec MVola, une plateforme conçue pour apporter simplicité, sécurité et contrôle à vos finances. Qu'il s'agisse d'envoyer de l'argent, de payer des factures ou de suivre votre historique financier, MVola rend les transactions quotidiennes plus faciles et plus accessibles.    

Caractéristiques principales : 
 - Transfert d'argent instantané : Envoyez ou recevez de l’argent en quelques clics.  
 - Paiement de factures : Payez vos factures de services publics, frais scolaires, et autres paiements depuis une seule application.  
 - Paiement avec QR code : Effectuez des achats en magasin simplement en scannant des QR codes. Profitez de paiements sécurisés et sans contact chez les commerçants partenaires.  
- Recharge de crédit et forfaits simplifiés : Achetez du crédit ou des forfaits de données, de voix et de SMS pour vous-même ou vos proches directement depuis l'application.  
- Sécurité et facilité d’utilisation : 
o	Vérification biométrique : Profitez d’une authentification rapide et sécurisée (par empreinte digitale/reconnaissance faciale). Vos données biométriques sont stockées uniquement sur votre appareil et ne sont jamais transmises à MVola ou à des tiers.
o	 Authentification sécurisée par code PIN  

-Services de crédit MVola :   L'application MVola offre des services de crédit pratiques pour répondre à vos besoins financiers à court terme à un taux de 9 %. 

 Comment faire une demande ?  
1.	Vérifiez votre éligibilité à une demande de crédit : Vous devez être âgé de 18 ans ou plus et disposer d’un compte MVola actif et vérifié.
2.	Ouvrez l'application MVola : Naviguez jusqu'à la section MVola Crédit.
3.	Choisissez le montant et le motif du crédit.  
4.	Sélectionnez un motif du Crédit : Chaque utilisateur devra sélectionner le motif du crédit parmi les options proposées par l'application.  
5.	Acceptez les termes et conditions d’utilisation : Accédez aux détails en cliquant sur le lien qui redirige vers les conditions générales d’utilisation de MVola, lisez et acceptez les conditions pour finaliser la demande.
6.	Processus de remboursement : Les remboursements sont dus à la date d’échéance présentée au moment de l'acceptation du Crédit. MVola envoie des rappels automatiques pour vous aider à effectuer les remboursements en temps voulu.  Tous les coûts sont transparents dès le départ, sans frais cachés, ni frais supplémentaires pendant la durée du crédit.  

- Service d’Epargne :   Épargnez et gagnez de l'argent :  
• Gagnez 4 % d'intérêts par an, versés trimestriellement.
     • Aucun dépôt initial n'est requis.  
     • Processus de souscription facile - commencez à gagner tout de suite.  

Permissions requises : 
 - Accès à la localisation approximative : Utilisé pour localiser les agents, les succursales et les commerçants à proximité qui acceptent les paiements MVola.
  - Accès à la caméra : Nécessaire pour scanner les codes QR lors des achats ou paiements des commerçants. 
 - Accès aux contacts : Permet uniquement de faciliter les transferts vers des contacts enregistrés et n’est jamais utilisé à d’autres fins.  
- Accès au stockage : Autorise l'application à stocker les reçus après chaque transaction sur votre téléphone.
  - Push Notification : Permet de recevoir des alertes concernant des activités importantes sur votre compte, telles que des offres promotionnelles, afin que vous soyez toujours informé. 

 Confidentialité et sécurité des données :  MVola ne recueille que les données nécessaires à la fourniture de ses services, en adhérant à des réglementations strictes en matière de protection des données. Toutes les transmissions de données, entre l’application et les systèmes de MVola, sont cryptées et stockées en toute sécurité.
 
Pour toute assistance ou question, veuillez contacter l'équipe d'assistance de MVola au +261 34 00 008 07.

Mobile data usage is free in the App.

View your balance and your transaction history 
Access your Orange Money balance in real time and see your last 50 transactions at a glance.

Transfer money
Transfer money to your contacts, whether they are in your country, internationally or with another operator. Also transfer money between your bank and Orange Money

Top up credit
Simply top up your phone credit or the credit of your contacts.

Pay and manage your bills
Discover all the Orange Money partners available. Consult and pay your bills in one click.

Pay your merchant
Pay your merchant with his merchant number or QR Code, no need to have the cash. 

Subscribe and mange Orange Bank
Discover Orange Bank Tik Tak offers to get a loan or to save money.
*Available only in Côte d’Ivoire

Security and privacy
Validate all your transactions with your secret code or with your fingerprint. Simply change your secret code and manage your privacy from the « My account » section.

Application available: Côte d’Ivoire, Cameroon, Mali, Guinea, Botswana, Democratic Republic of Congo, Madagascar, Liberia and Sierra Leone

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. You can send money directly from your debit card or bank account (depending on your location)

Why use TapTap Send to send money?

- Fast money transfers – most transfers arrive in minutes

- Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees when you send money

- Great exchange rates – we negotiate daily to offer you more value when you transfer funds

- Convenient transfers – send from your phone, anytime, anywhere

- Multiple payout options – transfer money to mobile wallets, bank accounts, or for cash pickup

You can send money to over 50 countries, including:

Pakistan

India

Nigeria

Ghana

Brazil

Mexico


…and many more. Explore the full list at taptapsend.com.

Send money from:

United Kingdom

United States

European Union

Canada

United Arab Emirates

Australia

We work with leading banks and financial partners to ensure your money reaches where it’s needed. Transfer money to:

Mobile wallets: Orange Money, MTN, JazzCash, Easypaisa, bKash

Bank accounts: HBL, UBL, Access Bank, Fidelity Bank, and many more

Cash pickup: Available at trusted partner bank branches in select countries

TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We understand the challenges of sending money internationally and are here to make every money transfer easier, faster, and more affordable. If you ever need support, our friendly team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Our Mission
We believe that diaspora communities deserve fast, secure, and fair ways to send money home. For too long, sending money internationally has been expensive and difficult. We’re changing that — by lowering costs, reducing delays, and improving your experience every time you transfer money.

Download TapTap Send and start sending money today.
Transfer money home — fast, safe, and stress-free.

*FX Gains apply
*Exchange rates for illustrative purposes only. Exchange rates are dynamic and are subject to fluctuation.

BNI MADAGASCAR, la première Banque Malagasy
Une banque à portée de main

Découvrez notre nouvelle application BNI qui révolutionne la gestion de vos finances. Conçue pour s’adapter à votre quotidien, elle vous permet de gérer vos comptes avec une simplicité inégalée, où que vous soyez et en toute sécurité.

1. Connectez-vous simplement :
Accédez à votre compte en toute sécurité à chaque étape. Créez votre code d’accès, activez la reconnaissance faciale ou empreinte digitale pour une connexion rapide, sécurisée et sans effort.

2. Tous vos services à portée de main :
Consultez vos comptes en temps réel.
Gérez vos épargnes et suivez leur évolution facilement.
Accédez à vos crédits en cours en un clic.
Soyez toujours au courant de vos assurances en cours.

3. Virement :
Envoyez de l’argent en quelques secondes. C’est simple, rapide et sécurisé.

4. Virements par QR Code :
Scannez, envoyez, c’est réglé ! Effectuez des virements rapides entre comptes BNI grâce à la fonction QR Code.

5. Historique détaillé :
Gardez un œil sur toutes vos transactions avec un historique clair et détaillé que vous pouvez même télécharger et archiver selon vos besoins.

6. Une nouvelle façon de gérer vos cartes :
Consultez vos transactions, vos cartes actives ou opposées, et accédez à tous les détails en un clin d’œil. Tout est là, en toute sécurité.

7. Votre crédit 100 % en ligne, simple et instantané
Obtenir votre crédit n’a jamais été aussi facile : depuis votre smartphone, choisissez l'offre qui vous correspond, validez votre demande, et profitez de votre crédit immédiatement.
Avec l’Application BNI, vous allez découvrir une nouvelle façon de souscrire à un crédit.

8. Paramètres et assistance :
Ajustez vos préférences, mettez à jour vos informations directement dans les paramètres.
Besoin d’aide ? Contactez notre service client directement depuis l’application.

Une application conçue pour vous
Une application entièrement repensée pour vous offrir une nouvelle expérience : fluide, rapide et agréable, tout en vous garantissant une sécurité optimale à chaque étape.

Téléchargez l’application BNI dès aujourd’hui et avancez avec confiance.
Votre banque est là pour vous, où que vous soyez.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Avec SG Connect, l’appli mobile des filiales africaines de Société Générale, gérée par Société Générale African Business Services, Gérer votre compte simplement, rapidement et en toute sécurité !

AVANTAGES 
L'appli mobile SG Connect simplifie votre relation avec la banque :
1. Facilitation du quotidien : Plus besoin de me déplacer en agence pour mes opérations courantes. Le service est disponible 24/7.
2. Temps réel : mes opérations sont traitées de manière instantanée (en temps réel) 
3. Sécurité : L’accès à l’application mobile ainsi que la validation de toutes opérations transactionnelles exigent systématiquement la saisie d’un mot de passe. 
4. Simplicité d’utilisation : L’application est facile d’usage avec une interface ergonomique et intuitive qui rend la navigation fluide.
ESPACES
L’appli mobile m’offre deux espaces de navigation : 
- Un espace Public : je peux y accéder sans authentification et bénéficier d’un ensemble de services pratiques (géo localisation d’une agence ou d’un Distributeur Automatique de Billets (DAB), consultation des contacts utiles, consultation du cours des devises, …)
- mon espace sécurisé : il suffit que j’active mon compte pour y accéder de manière sécurisée et bénéficier de toutes les fonctionnalités liées à la gestion de mes comptes bancaires. Je peux consulter mes comptes, …
FONCTIONNALITES
L’appli mobile m’offre plusieurs fonctionnalités : 
- Consulter le solde et l’historique de mes comptes (courant et épargne),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
- Télécharger votre RIB ;
- Recap des Opérations,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
- Géolocaliser une agence ou un distributeur automatique de billets ;
... Et bien d'autres services à découvrir

Rapid, affordable international money transfers. 

We send from the US, UK, Canada, France, Italy, Spain and Ireland to Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Ghana, Nigeria, Senegal, Liberia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Sri Lanka, Haiti, The Philippines, Bangladesh and Lebanon.

Rapid, affordable transfers can be sent from debit cards (including Postepay in Italy) to mobile wallets, bank accounts and in Nigeria for cash pickup. 

Sending a transfer is as easy and affordable as sending a text and we use industry standard 256-bit encryption to ensure security.

Realtime updates ensure you know the status of your transfers and our support team is available 24/7 for personalized assistance.

Join the 400,000 active users and counting who trust Sendwave and start sending money with love today.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

COMPLIANCE & SECURITY YOU CAN TRUST
 • Globally Licensed: Authorized in multiple regions for money services, custody, and crypto services.

 • Seamless Onboarding: ID verification under 5 minutes, giving you secure access anytime.

JOIN THE MOVEMENT
Be part of our growing global community and experience the future of borderless finance! Download RedotPay today and begin your journey toward financial freedom and inclusion.

RISK WARNING

CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. Depending on the company, between 60-79.58% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with Capital.com Group. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

LICENCES AND REGULATION

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

We’ve made it easier for you to manage your Western Union transfers with the Western Union: Self Service app. 

If you need to request money from a friend or family member, track a transfer, redirect an incoming transfer to your bank account, or find a nearby Western Union agent location – we have you covered. 

 

Key features: 


• Request money from your sender 
Do you need extra money? Now you can make money requests from senders in multiple countries whenever you need it. With the Western Union: Self Service app, requesting money has never been easier. 

• Track a money transfer 
To track your money transfer in real time, enter the tracking number (MTCN) and get the real-time status of your money. 

• Redirect transfers 
You can redirect any cash transfer to your bank account for fast and secure access to your funds. 

• Find a Western Union agent location 
Your app can also help you find a nearby Western Union agent location in just a few taps. Remember that our Western Union agent locations are independent businesses providing our money transfer services to our customers. 

• Get in touch with us 

No matter what questions or concerns you may have, we’re here for you. You can also get in touch by visiting a nearby Western Union agent location. 

 


With the Western Union: Self Service app, you can now change the way you receive money in Morocco and the Philippines! 




Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985. See terms and conditions for details. Certain features may not be available to or from all countries and are subject to change. Learn more in the Western Union: Self Service app. 

The information transmitted, including any content in this communication, is confidential, intended only for the use of the intended recipient, and is the property of the Western Union Company or its affiliates and subsidiaries. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use of the information contained in or transmitted with this communication, or dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify the Western Union sender immediately by replying to this message and delete the original message.

Investing.com offers a set of financial tools covering a wide variety of global and local financial instruments. A one-stop-shop for traders and investors.

REAL-TIME DATA
Live quotes and charts for over 100,000 financial instruments, traded on over 70 global exchanges.
Track major global indices, stocks, bonds, commodities, interest rates, and futures and options

ECONOMIC CALENDAR
Live updates on global economic events customized to your personal interests.
Our real-time Economic Calendar is used by top traders and investors to track market-moving events as they are announced, making it easy to track market impact.

PERSONALIZED PORTFOLIO
Add your favorite financial instruments and their holdings to your portfolio.
Build your own customized watchlist and keep track of stock quotes, currencies, commodities, indices, ETFs and bonds - all synced with your Investing.com account. Your personal Watchlist can be accessed anytime from your menu, providing you with real-time prices, and the Holdings Portfolio shows you your total assets value 24/7.

ALERTS
Our Alerts system allows you to receive customizable alerts for any instrument, economic event or new analysis articles. For all 100,000 financial instruments, you can set up notifications for a specific price, change by %, or Volume. All pushed by request, and synced with the website.

NEWS & ANALYSIS
Breaking news, videos, updates and analysis on global financial markets, as well as technology, politics and business.
Be the first to read the latest on stocks, commodities, and the global economy.


FINANCIAL TOOLS
Quick access to all of our world-class tools, including: Economic Calendar, Earnings Calendar, Technical Summary, Currency Converter, Market Quotes, advanced charts and more.

INVESTING PRO 
Outsmart the Market and Unlock Enterprise-Quality, Actionable Analysis and Insights with Investing PRO.

 Exclusive Features:
-100% Ad-Free Experience
-Access To 100+ Fundamental Metrics
-Fair Value Estimates Made With Machine Learning
-Interactive Peer Comparison Tools
-Company Health Scores and Sector Rankings
...and many more Advanced Financial Tools

Investing PRO is a paid subscription service. 

ALREADY A MEMBER?
Sign-in and continue where you left off by syncing your portfolio and personal alerts between all of your devices.

SOCIAL
Join our growing community of traders and investors and share articles to Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

COMMODITY PRICES
Follow up-to-the-second commodity prices, including: Gold, Silver, Copper, Platinum, Crude Oil, Brent Oil and Natural Gas.

MAJOR STOCKS
Track stock market leaders: Apple Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL), Bank of America Corporation (BAC), Tesla (TSLA), General Electric Company (GE), Cisco Systems, Inc. (CSCO), American Express Company (AXP), Lloyds Banking (LLOY), Vodafone Group (VOD), Amazon (AMZN), Nike (NKE), Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Barclays (BARC), Netflix (NFLX), and many more.

GLOBAL INDICES
Follow data from all major stock market indices, including:
■ U.S: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ, SmallCap 2000
■ Americas: Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA
■ Europe: CAC 40, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, ATX, BEL 20, DAX, BSE Sofia, PX

■ Middle East: Bahrain All Share, EGX 30, Amman SE General, Kuwait Main, TA 35

RATES BONDS
Real-time data on bonds, including US Yield Bonds, Euro Bund, UK Gilt, Euro BTP and more.

app_name: 同花顺iFinD—机构级金融资讯数据平台
developer: Zhejiang flush Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
iFinD是同花顺旗下的机构级金融数据平台，致力于为专业投资者进行金融市场研究和高效决策提供专业支持。软件覆盖股票、债券、基金、指数、商品、外汇、宏观等领域，移动版iFinD终端在深度资料、数据浏览器，全球行情、舆情资讯、研究报告、公司公告、企业库、路演等多个专业投研功能方面，实现了与PC版的无缝对接，帮助数以万计金融工作者获取第一手金融数据。除此之外，我们在AI领域亦有较深布局，涉及对话、研报、绘图、纪要等场景。您可随时通过掌上同花顺iFinD获取全球市场行情、全天候新闻资讯以及丰富的智能投研工具，即刻开启移动投研旅程吧！

【特色功能】
*「研报中心」与招商证券、国泰君安等知名机构达成研报战略合作，提供海量机构研报，随时掌握最新一手研报数据，在线同步浏览便捷分享
*「查数据」一键查询百万最新宏观经济、行业、股票数据，您的掌上经济数据中心
*「组合管理」支持股票、期货、债券、基金等多种证券类型，为您提供组合配置、实时监控、绩效分析、风险控制等一体化组合投研工具
*「事件驱动」AI大数据实时计算近千概念，异动解析精选个股，助您把握投资机会
*「产业链中心」从上至下全角度产业解析，细分赛道龙头公司尽在掌握
*「企业库」AI赋能企业数据，全方位满足您在金融营销、风控与项目研究中对企业信息的需求
*「AI语音同译」提供语音录制、语音实时转译、文档编辑功能，会议纪要整理必备工具
*「iFinD路演」每日知名权威专家路演直播，深入解读市场热点，剖析行业投资逻辑把握投资机会，更可以和专家直播间在线交流
*「问财选股」支持自然语言输入，提供智能诊股选股策略

【基础功能】
*「行情」覆盖国内外股票、期货、期权、债券、基金、外汇、指数等，机构专业级行情数据
*「自选」实时同步同花顺账号自选股，快速查看自选股行情、公告、新闻、研报，支持自选分组，动态监控
*「资讯」每日财经早餐要闻提醒，财经资讯全天候不间断更新，时刻获取证券市场最新动向
*「深度资料」为您提供多、快、全、准的上市公司数据，深度挖掘公司基本信息、财务数据、公司公告、新闻研报等专业内容，
*「搜索」汇聚全平台多维信息，支持证券、数据、资讯、研报、公告、企业等各类专业内容一键搜索，高效筛选相关内容

【关于同花顺】
同花顺(300033)成立于1995年，是一家专业的互联网金融数据服务商，为您全方位提供财经资讯及全球金融市场行情，覆盖股票、基金、期货、外汇、债券、银行、黄金等多种面向个人和企业的服务。

【用户帮助】
感谢您使用同花顺iFinD手机客户端，使用中有任何问题和建议可通过以下方式联系我们。
24小时热线：952555
微信：核新同花顺iFinD  ths_iFinD
官网：https://www.51ifind.com/

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Accesa - l’application mobile de la banque Malgache, AccèsBanque Madagascar, qui vous permet de gérer votre compte à distance gratuitement, en toute simplicité et sécurité.
Vos avantages ?
 1.⁠ ⁠Accédez à vos comptes bancaires et aux services courants de la banque à tout moment 24/7, où que vous soyez
 2.⁠ ⁠Définissez vous-même votre identifiant et mot de passe
 3.⁠ ⁠Suivez les mouvements de vos comptes en temps réel et instantanément
 4.⁠ ⁠Effectuez vos transactions instantanément
 5.⁠ ⁠Sécurisez vos transactions par un code OTP
 6.⁠ ⁠Personnalisez l’appli selon votre choix
Ce qu’on peut faire dedans ?
 1.⁠ ⁠Consultation de solde de tous les comptes actifs
 2.⁠ ⁠Consultation d’information sur chaque compte
 3.⁠ ⁠Consultation des historiques de transactions (illimité)
 4.⁠ ⁠Téléchargement des historiques des transactions
 5.⁠ ⁠Consultation du statut du crédit en cours (historique de paiement, prochain paiement, calendrier de paiement)
 6.⁠ ⁠Transfert d’argent entre comptes ABM ou vers les autres banques locales
 7.⁠ ⁠Réception d’argent à l’international via MoneyGram
 8.⁠ ⁠Gestion de bénéficiaires de virement favoris
 9.⁠ ⁠Demande de carte, de crédit, ….
Et bien d’autres services que vous pouvez découvrir vous-même en naviguant sur l’appli.

The Remitly app offers financial services that transcend borders, enabling family and friends to send money abroad easily. Choose from convenient delivery with approximately 470,000 cash pickup options worldwide including various currencies provided, and over 5 billion bank accounts and mobile wallets. Risk management in financial markets is one of the keys to success. Therefore, it is important to set up a trading strategy of your own.

It is for this purpose that the FX Calculators application has been created. It will help you in your risk management and your decision making by providing you a suite of simple and effective tools.

Forex calculators available :

• Fibonacci Levels : 
A simple tool to identify strategic places for transactions, stop losses or target prices within a trend.

• Pip Value : 
The fastest way to determine the value per pip in your account currency.

• Pivots Points : 
A simple way to determine resistances and supports levels.

• Position Size: 
Calculate the proper size that meets your risk management.

• Margin: 
Calculate the margin needed to open and hold positions.

• Stop Loss/Take Profit :
Determine how much you stand to lose or gain if your stop-loss or take-profit levels have been reached.
